sentence: We are already facing an unprecedented increase in migrants this year.” Mark Kelly, a Democratic senator from Arizona who faces a tough re-election fight, said: “This is a crisis and in my estimation, because of a lack of planning from the administration, it’s about to get worse.” The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) insists it will be ready.

sentence: The policy change, though, is frustrating conservatives like McCarthy, as well as moderate Democratic senators like Senator Mark Kelly and Kyrsten Sinema of Arizona, Senator Catherine Cortez Masto of Nevada and Senator Jon Tester of Montana.
